questions.question: Spill the tea on your digital life! If your screen time could talk, what would it say you're addicted to?
options: Scrolling through the 'Gram like it's your job
Binge-watching shows until your eyes glaze over
Getting lost in virtual worlds and pwning n00bs
Vibing to tunes that make your soul dance
Riding the wave of viral vids and spicy memes

questions.question: Weekend mood: how do you recharge your batteries when adulting takes a backseat?
options: Squad goals: linking up with the homies for epic adventures
Hermit mode: nestling in your cocoon of comfy vibes
Wanderlust warrior: chasing new horizons and Insta-worthy moments
Creative beast: unleashing your inner artist on passion projects
Couch commander: conquering digital realms from your fortress of solitude

questions.question: Your brain's jukebox is stuck on repeat. What's the soundtrack of your life right now?
options: Pop bangers that make you move without even trying
Rock anthems that fuel your rebel soul
Hip-hop flows that speak your truth
EDM beats that transform you into a dance floor deity
Indie tunes that make you feel effortlessly cool

questions.question: You're the star of your own movie. What genre is your life story serving today?
options: Action-packed thrill ride with explosive plot twists
Laugh-out-loud comedy where you're the lovable mess
Deep drama exploring the human condition (aka your feelings)
Swoon-worthy romance with a dash of will-they-won't-they
Mind-bending sci-fi that questions reality itself
